channel.title: How to kill anyone
channel.description:
You will need the following items:
-A bucket -A [b]machete[/b] (thanks Buzzy) -Ability to read (to read this) -An assistant -Boots
1. Welcome him into your home. Hide the machete in your shirt. 2. Say your going to the washroom. Then put on the boots. 3. So he's lying on couch, or sitting down. Get your bucket and slam him on the head. This will conk him out. 4. While he's asleep, get out your machete and make a small incision in the neck. Slash off a arm. 5. Use the bucket and put the blood in. Now smash a body part into the ground with the boots. 6. Get your assistant to help put the blood in. Remember he should be outside at all times.
P.S. Goto happytreefriends.com for bloody madness! (No joke, a bear in the movies try to kill people... and do.)
[shadow=red,left]VB6 FTW[/shadow]

item.title: How to kill anyone
item.dc:creator: @llib llib
item.description:
@llib wrote:

[quote=“gemini112, post:27, topic:122344”]Tiny pistol-with silencer u need something to saw bones and an incinerater

step 1: quiet head shot
Step 2:remove hands arms and legs and they lose their identity
step 3 incinerate head legs and arms

There u go Best murder ever =][/quote]

…That is far from the best murder ever. Why would you remove the limbs from the torso…just so you could incinerate them?

Read full topic

i thought it was like this

1.drop pencil
2.ask the bitch to pick it up
3.hit him/her on the skull with a hammer
[/quote]

Hmm, I think Hitler may have some leftover ovens. Lemme go ask him.[/quote]
Good idea. No one would realize that one.
or we could just drop some cyanide pellets into there car. hitler would still be happy

item.title: How to kill anyone
item.dc:creator: @dragonus18 dragonus18
item.description:
@dragonus18 wrote:

Whether they start because of him hating on someones work in Graphics section, or just trying to piss someone off in a topic.

the only time i ever hate on people’s work int he graphics section is if there work really sucks and I’m never the first one to say the work sucks, i don’t really think i’ve ever flamed and/or been flamed in the graphics section, so obviously your just pulling all of this information out of your ass and typing it.

and I never try to piss people off, it’s just how it always ends up when i bring up good point, also

he just doesn't like to put that much work into posting.

i have never and will never say that.

Read full topic

item.title: How to kill anyone
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

exe626:

Proper grammar doesn’t make a person who they are.

Yes, but it provides examples about their traits. For one, If he were to reply to my post saying he just doesn’t like to put that much work into posting. That shows carelessness, independability, lack of respect, and many other simple things. I can’t say I use perfect grammar, but I try. I make an attempt to better myself, and to make my posts legible.

It doesn’t matter about his grammar or not, I just used that to further my point. He goes in peoples topics looking for fights. Whether they start because of him hating on someones work in Graphics section, or just trying to piss someone off in a topic. He does it on purpose, he ‘Trolls’ the forums. He’s a nuisance. Most all of his posts are flame, and are never productive. He doesn’t even make an attempt to change, he likes being an asshole to everyone. And I can’t say I respect him, because I don’t.

But anyways, back on subject. You can kill anyone with anything, even in the case I brought up about sensory overload, it can happen to anybody, whether it is brought on by premature birth, or head injuries.

Read full topic

item.title: How to kill anyone
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“dragonus18, post:21, topic:122344”][quote author=ThAt0n36Uy link=topic=172018.msg1876328#msg1876328 date=1194578306]

Anything can kill you!! Even a little hair, it can induce the gag reflex then it might get stuff gagging and you choke to death!

liesss you can’t kill someone using a tiny tiny droplet of water

Actually you can, there are some people that in birth they weren’t full developed, e.g. Premature babies, and when that happens, sometimes their nerve receptors don’t work correctly, which can lead to incorrect interception of nerve signals, like a drop of water, or a splash of water can induce vomitting, or muscle reflexes. So by a person having this illness, they could be hit by a drop of water, induce vomiting, and gag on their own vomit.
[/quote]
yes but not EVERYONE has that defect, thus it won’t kill ANYONE it would just kill somebody with that defect, and i’m sure they would be dead before you got to them.[/quote]

The fact you can’t even punctuate correctly or even capitalize, shows your ignorance. Whether all people are affected by that type of sensory overload is not the issue. It’s whether or not a person could be killed with anything at any given time. That illness is not uncommon. And deaths caused by that occur regularly. If I were you, I’d shut up now.

Read full topic

item.description:

Anything can kill you!! Even a little hair, it can induce the gag reflex then it might get stuff gagging and you choke to death!

liesss you can’t kill someone using a tiny tiny droplet of water

You may have me beat
